address: Room 1503, building No.2, Lane 388, Zhongjiang Road, Shanghai, Putuo District
productShellSeriesDesc: Truffles Shell series is a complex and multi-layered palate chocolate made with a unique mixture of milk and hazelnut ganache. They are popular with its vivid appearance shaped in seeshell and seahorse, which tastes like a party in your mouth.
subClassicSlogan: Always remember the taste, mellow and intoxicating
subClassicDesc: Truffles Classic flavor has a rich taste in mild bitterness, a bit lighter than the black Traditional series, but still mellow and savory.
subFantasyDesc: The French truffle flavor are tasted in a way to give you the actually medieval French court feeling, enjoying exquisite delicacy and romance.
subTraditionalDesc: The Traditional series are coated with cocoa powder to release a bitter flavor with the first bite, then it melts in you mouth with more sweet flalor of aroma.
subCrunchySlogan: Crisp and crunchy, irresistible smell of rice
subCrunchyDesc: The chocolate is well paired with grain crips to make itself an enjoyable taste. It melts in you mouth with a creamy taste that makes you eat up unconsciously.
subMachaSlogan: Bright taste of green tea to release elegant flavor
subMachaDesc: On the palate it has flavors of light green tea that intermingles in a strong chocolate which is counterbalanced by a fresh sweetness and culminates in a zesty finish.
subCocoaNibsSlogan: Smooth and rich— just can't put it down
subCocoaNibsDesc: Truffles Cocoa nibs has a rich palate. With each bite of the chocolate, you will feel the cocoa nibs bringing out its flavor and feel more when chewing it. The cocoa powder contains rich natrual antioxidants, which is good to your health.
subSavouryFantasySlogan: Taste its strong atmosphere of chocolate, smooth and savory
subSavouryFantasyDesc: Truffles Fantasy is popular with its mellow and rich taste, and full of lovely sweet smell.
subMilkyDesc: The milky series has a rich taste with 28.5% milk content, which makes it nourishing expecially for children. Milk and chocolate make a delicious combination when balanced carefully.
subLatteMacchiattoDesc: When lattee meets macchiatto — the paring brings out the delightful aroma of coffee and make itself a perfect afternoon tea.
subStrawberryDesc: Truffles strawberry has a sweet multi-layer taste paring with rich chocolate, which brings out fruity flavor, like walking in a beautiful fields.
subToffeeSlogan: Toffee and chocolate, a romantic date in your mouth
subToffeeDesc: The Toffee series is most girls' favorite with the unusual mixture of velvety chocolate and rich taffy. The silky taste paring with sweet taffy would make you want more.
subEiffelSlogan: Taste its strong atmosphere of chocolate, smooth and savory
subEiffelDesc: This series has a unique image of the Eiffel Tower on the package, which reminds you of romantic boulervard in Paris . Tasting the chocolate makes you feel sweetness and romance like strolling on the bank of la Seine.
subRowBlockSeriesDesc: The chocolate bar tastes like silk flying around. The smooth texture works beautifully with the well-balanced hardness, lending extra sheen to the chocolate. The crisp sound on every bite sounded like note melodies resounded.
subMachaSoftSlogan: Always find a wonderful heart inside it
subLiqueurSeriesSlogan: There's a sweet ocean in your heart and mouth
subLiqueurSeriesDesc: It is a special flavor combination, with cherries working beautifully with Truffles dark chocolate. It wakes up your tastebuds – its rich taste with cherries inside bringing out the flavor.
subCandySeriesDesc: Truffles wedding series, as a pledge for the couple, proves the greatest love of deeping, everlasting, and accompanying.
subTraditionalBlackDesc: The Traditional series are coated with cocoa powder to release a bitter flavor with the first bite, then it melts in you mouth with more sweet flalor of aroma.
subRomanticGiftBoxDesc: Truffles fill the red heart-shaped gift box with glossy and smooth chocolate to express one's love and caring.
subChineseRedGiftBoxSlogan: Everybody has chocolates, it's family time
subChineseRedGiftBoxDesc: Truffles Red Gift Box, in a gold and red package, makes you in a delightful mood like in a festival celebration.
subBearGiftBoxDesc: Truffle Bear gift box is a trustworthy friend with cute toy bear and chocolates paired  in, which helps you to convey messages to the ones you love.
